intro.description: This cheat sheet walks you through creating a new Java-based Escape model.

item.title: Create your Scape class
item.description:
The next step is to create the actual model class. In the main toolbar again, click on the New Java Class button (or the link below). If not already specified, select your project's src directory as the source folder. Enter CoordinationGame for the class name, "ede.brook.model" as the package name, and select the checkbox to create the main() method, then click Finish.
The Java editor will automatically open showing your new class.

item.title: Copy the Coordination Game code.
item.description: To implement the model, we'll just copy the code from the Ascape manual. If you don't have the Ascape documentation installed you can find the code at: http://ascape.sourceforge.net/manual/Appendix.html#1.
